page.title: 04INTERVIEW: DOUNBY PENSIONER
page.content: Mrs.Mary Stockan lives in Dounby and has done so since 1948. Before that she lived in Harray Post Office, just along the road. She is an Old Age Pensioner. The biggest{changes in Dounby}are the new school and the amount of new houses which have been built. This she likes, and would hope to see Dounby expand even more. Not all things have changed for the better however. She does not like speeding cars going past the house and thinks that there is a lot more drinking in pubs and bars than there used to be. She would rather be a child now, than when she was growing up, as they had none of the privileges children have now like Gym, sports and Instrumental Tuition. She will probably live in Dounby for the rest of her life.
